alert.this_blog_is_available_in_only_english: This blog is only available in English

welcome.description: <bold>Product-focused Full-Stack Developer</bold> with <bold>3+ years of experience</bold> delivering robust, scalable software solutions across <bold>frontend, backend, mobile in BIM and IoT domains.</bold> Specialized in <bold>Java Spring Boot, React, Next.js, Node.js, and PostgreSQL</bold>. Adept at architecting <bold>multi-tenant SaaS platforms, real-time systems, and payment integrations.</bold> Combines strong engineering fundamentals with <bold>creative problem-solving</bold> and a <bold>clean, systematic coding approach.</bold>

toolbox.title: Creativity needs a lot of tools
toolbox.description: Have a lot of tools in my toolbox, and i'm always learning new ones.

timeline.title: My Journey
timeline.description: My transition from a Structural Engineer to a Software Developer has been a journey of learning, growth, and transformation. Here's a snapshot of my professional journey so far.

geomap.title: Global Visitors Heatmap
geomap.description: Explore the global distribution of visitors to my portfolio through this interactive heatmap. Each point on the map represents a visitor's location, providing insights into where my audience is coming from around the world.
